Powered By

Configure site.xml

To use our skin in your project, add this declaration to your site.xml.

<skin>
    <groupId>org.patrodyne</groupId>
    <artifactId>patrodyne-site-skin</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
</skin>
